org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful

Class RestfulDiffuser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.AbstractDiffuser
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.RestfulDiffuser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Diffuser

    public class RestfulDiffuser
extends AbstractDiffuser
    A diffuser that uses REST to diffuser methods to remote RESTful diffusers, or runs the task locally. To diffuse to a remote diffuser, this diffuser instantiates a RESTful client (RestfulDiffuserManagerClient) that is then used to send the task to the remote server.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuser

        public RestfulDiffuser(Serializer serializer,
               DiffuserStrategy strategy,
               java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths,
               double loadThreshold)
        Constructs the RESTful diffuser that runs methods either locally or sends them on to a remote RESTful diffuser.
        Parameters:
        serializer - The object that converts the object into and out of the form that is transmitted across the wire.
        strategy - The diffuser strategy that determines which end-point will get called next
        classPaths - The class paths on a remote server needed for loading classes that aren't locally available
        loadThreshold - The load threshold above which the RestfulDiffuser will forward execution of the task to remote diffuser. The load threshold must be in the interval (0.0, infinity]
        See Also:
        DiffuserLoadCalc

    • Method Detail

      • runObject

        public java.lang.Object runObject(double load,
                         java.lang.Class<?> returnType,
                         java.lang.Object object,
                         java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.lang.Class<?>[] argTypes,
                         java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Description copied from interface: Diffuser
        Runs the specified method on the specified object.
        Parameters:
        load - The CPU load gives the load (under a measure specified by the implementation of the DiffuserLoadCalc). The load is compared to a configured load threshold. If the load is less than the threshold, then the Diffuser ought to execute the task locally. On the other hand, if the load is larger than the threshold, then the Diffuser ought to forward the task to a remote Diffuser. The remote Diffuser is selected based on a configured DiffuserStrategy, which returns the end-point of the remove Diffuser to which to forward the task.
        object - The object on which to make the method call given by the specified method name
        methodName - The name of the method to call on the object
        argTypes - The types of the arguments. This is necessary to preserve primitive arguments which would otherwise be automatically autoboxed.
        arguments - The arguments to be passed to the method. Typically the implementing class will use reflection to determine the Method, and so the parameter types will be used as part of the signature.
        Returns:
        The result of the method on the specified object
        See Also:
        #runObject(Object, String), #runObject(Object, String, Object)
